TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ReorderTabHandler(object o, ReorderTabArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ReorderTabHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ReorderTabHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ReorderTabHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ReorderTabHandler is removed from the event.
